link.title: Don't Touch My Phone Cute Cat iPhone and Android Wallpaper - Calming A – Show Barn Life

meta.name: description
meta.content: Wallpapers on your phone can influence mood to a great extent, as it is the first thing that is visible after opening the phone. Crisp, colorful, and lovely Wallpaper will not only make you feel refreshed but also personalize your device and make it look attractive. Why be ordinary when you can be unique with your hand-designed iPhone or Android lock and home screen wallpapers. You will get two uniquely-designed phone wallpapers; lock screen and home screen designs. The wallpapers can easily be resized to fit almost any phone.***For personal use only!*** Sizing info: The wallpaper dimensions are 2000 x 4000px.
